suite.name: Recon-Api

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: Running command 'ozone freon rk --replicationType=RATIS --numOfVolumes 1 --numOfBuckets 1 --numOfKeys 10 --keySize 1025 2>&1'.

*************************************************** Status: Success Git Base Revision: b3cbbb467e22ea829b3808f4b7b01d07e0bf3842 Number of Volumes created: 1 Number of Buckets created: 1 Number of Keys added: 10 Ratis replication factor: ONE Ratis replication type: RATIS Average Time spent in volume creation: 00:00:00,018 Average Time spent in bucket creation: 00:00:00,001 Average Time spent in key creation: 00:00:00,060 Average Time spent in key write: 00:00:00,552 Total bytes written: 10250 Total Execution time: 00:00:05,589 ***************************************************

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.
kw.msg: Argument types are: <class 'int'> <type 'unicode'>

test.name: Check if Recon picks up OM data

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

arguments.arg: Check if Recon picks up container from OM
